creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Text; 
First Day-No. 7(Shonichi, nana-ban)
Second Day-No.10(Futsukame, ju_-ban)
Third Day-No.5(Mikkame, go-ban)
meaning unknown

Another text on the lower left is the list of names of musician with their playing instruments on the upper part. The list suggests this group of musicians provides a back ground music for a kabuki play.
medium: Woodblock print (surimono), ink and color on paper
title: Name List of Musicians
